dataList.name: Superposed Afterimage
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: Gain [TimeEntangleFour] At the start of the first turn of each pattern, gain [TimeGapAb] equal to ([TimeEntangleDesc] stage x 400) (once per [TimeEntangleDesc] stage) At stage 3 and 4 [TimeEntangleDesc], if this unit loses all [TimeGapAb], the pattern changes and become Staggered for the next turn Take -30% HP, SP damage from [Combustion], [Laceration], [Burst], and [Sinking]; -30% to Stagger Threshold raised by [Vibration]

dataList.name: Afterimage Reverberation
dataList.desc:
On hit with this unit's Coin, deal Slash damage equal to (the Coin's final damage / 10)
- This effect activates ([TimeEntangleDesc] stage) times; damage from this effect cannot Stagger target

dataList.name: Lacerating Afterimages from Myriad Moments
dataList.desc:
Attack Skill End: Deal (# of Slash Coins that hit Critically x 10) Slash damage against each target) (damage from this effect cannot Stagger target)

Attack Skill End: Consume every surplus [Breath] Potency past 20 on self and inflict [PhantomIncision] to target by [Breath] Potency consumed

dataList.name: Unsheathing Dihui Star's Blade
dataList.desc:
Use a powerful attack pattern every 4 turns
- At 50+ [PhantomIncisionTotal], the pattern above becomes empowered
dataList.flavor: '... I'm weary of this stigma of a blade.'

dataList.name: 'I Shall Give You Some Quarter'
dataList.desc:
Deal -50% final damage with this unit's Skill against targets that used Defense Skill

Turn End: Gain 2 [Vulnerable] and 2 [AttackDmgUp] every 4 turn in this Encounter (applies cumulatively; max 2 times per Encounter)

dataList.name: Living Nerves - Partial Deterrence Release
dataList.desc:
Upon death, all Skills are cancelled for the turn
Gain 10 [SelfCharge] when the effect above activates

dataList.name: Undying Persistence
dataList.desc: Every 5 turns, gains a Shield equal to the head's HP

dataList.name: Terminated Persistence
dataList.desc:
After using 'Coil Up', if the Shield is exhausted, spend all [SelfCharge]
All parts become Staggered next turn

dataList.name: The Last Ember
dataList.desc: At 30%- HP, gain +1 more [MRcAiBa]

dataList.name: Stoke the Flames
dataList.desc:
When the Wings Part is broken, inflict [MRcAiBb] equal to [MRcAiBa] Stack to the last attacker; then, all [MRcAiBa] on self expires.

When using 'Ardor Blossom Star' at 0 [MRcAiBa], use 'Stoke the Flames' as well

dataList.name: Flaming Ember
dataList.desc: Convert a number of non-Wrath Skills equal to [MRcAiBa] Stack into Wrath Skills

dataList.name: Interlocking Ardor Blossom
dataList.desc:
If this unit has [MRcAiBa], convert a number of non-Wrath Skills equal to [MRcAiBa] Stack into Wrath Skills

On Hit, inflict [Combustion] equal to (# of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn)

On Hit, heal HP equal to (# of Wrath Skills that the Ardor Blossom Moth will use this turn x 2)

dataList.name: Supply Resources
dataList.desc: When the Wings Part is broken, gain 2 E.G.O Resource of all Affinity and heal all Sinners' SP by 15

dataList.name: Flaming Wings - Partial Deterrence Release
dataList.desc:
Does not take [Combustion] damage

Turn End: Heal Core by ([Combustion] on self x 5)

dataList.name: Prescript Delivered on a Device
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: Gain Shield equal to 20% of max HP (remains throughout this Encounter) Turn Start: - Gain [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] based on [UnlockBuff_Base] stage on self - Inflict [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] to a random enemy and prioritize attacking that enemy (excluding certain pattern) Deal +2.5% damage to [IndexPrescriptTargetToPersonality] for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] (max 20%) - At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], deal +30% damage to all targets instead

dataList.name: Will of the Prescript
dataList.desc: Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was executed this turn, heal 15 SP and gain [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] by ([UnlockBuff_Base] stage + 1) (once per turn) Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was not executed this turn, gain 1 [PressureOfPrescript] and 5 [KarmaOfIndexStudent] - If this unit does not have [UnlockBuff_Base], gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] at Turn End - At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy], does not gain [KarmaOfIndexStudent] - If this unit is under the effect of Effloresced[TabExplain] E.G.O::Procuration, double [KarmaOfIndexStudent] this unit will gain

dataList.name: Unlock
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] or at 90%-/75%-/60%- HP, - Gain [UnlockBuff_1]/[UnlockBuff_2]/[UnlockBuff_3] - Heal to 45 SP - Consume all [PressureOfPrescript] and recover from Stagger - Gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] in the turn after [UnlockBuff_Base] was gained for the first time If [UnlockBuff_Base] was gained based on HP conditional above, - Gain [KarmaOfIndexStudent] by (sum of healed SP / 15) - Increase [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] to 3/6/9 if this unit had less than 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy]; gain 1 [DefenseDown] and 2 [KarmaOfIndexStudent] next turn for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptEnemy] Stack gained Min & Max Speed +10 in the turn this unit uses its powerful attack
dataList.flavor: "It is said that the blade and fabric granted by the Prescript unlock their power only when the Prescript is executed."

dataList.name: Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit has [UnlockBuff_Base] and is at 25+ SP, consume 15 SP to enter Effloresced[TabExplain] E.G.O::Procuration state and recover from Stagger
- Gain [Blandishment_Enemy] and a different set of Resistance values while in this state
- Turn Start: at 0 or less SP, exit Effloresced[TabExplain] E.G.O::Procuration state

dataList.name: Annihilation Form
dataList.desc:
When Vespa enters the battlefield:
- If [UnlockBuff_Base] is below stage II, gain [UnlockBuff_3], heal SP to 45, and recover from Stagger
- Gain 1 [Blandishment_Shin_Enemy] and gain Shield equal to 50% of max HP (lasts for the rest of this Encounter)
- Disable the [PressureOfPrescript] cost of activating the 'Unlock[TabExplain]' Passive
- Intensify [PressureOfPrescript] to [PressureOfPrescript_2nd] and max out its Stack
- Turn Start: Gain 1 [PressureOfPrescript_2nd]
- Then, this unit's SP does not drop below 0

At 20% or less HP, max out [PressureOfPrescript_2nd] Stack
dataList.flavor: 'W-what a dangerous person... The Prescript could go unfulfilled at this rate.'

dataList.name: Panic Recovery
dataList.desc: Turn End: if in Panic, reset SP to 30.
